feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 10:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: ENE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming east 30 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
